name: apb-tippspil-mobile
description: APB Limited Getraunaleikur EM Ã­ Handbolta - Mobile App

scripts.build: echo 'Building web assets...' && mkdir -p www && cp index.html www/ && cp app.js www/ && cp firebase.js www/ && cp manifest.json www/ && cp sw.js www/
scripts.cap:sync: npm run build && npx cap sync
scripts.deploy:ios: npm run build && npx cap sync ios && npx cap open ios
scripts.deploy:android: npm run build && npx cap sync android && npx cap open android

author: APB Limited
